english.segment1: You find me with one glance
english.segment2: Led me out from darkness, washed away my past. . Forgiven now I stand. . With You there is a promise of hope that always lasts
english.segment3: Youre the reason I get down on my knees. . And the reason my heart sings Your praise. . Through grace Youve given liberty
english.segment6: Your hand has come to rescue me
english.segment7: And showed me who Im meant to be
english.segment8: In Jesus there is glorious life
english.segment9: Youre with me as I wake
english.segment10: I leave my bed to follow You, face another day
english.segment11: With You there is no hate
english.segment12: Your Love it does a better job, shows a better way
